title: Falling
description: Abby Lowe considered herself to be one of the biggest nerds in the junior class, if not the entire school. She didn't have much of a social life but dreamed of being noticed by the most popular senior, who just happened to be her best friend's older brother. Connor is constantly around Abby but he just sees her like a little sister. When Abby starts dating one of Connor's best friends things begin to change. Could Abby actually get her dream of being with Connor or will she always be seen as the little sister's best friend?
author: Tate Layman
